PART IV (B) – GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 18.07.2022
 1A
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
w;s úfYI
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
EXTRAORDINARY
(Published by Authority)
PART  IV (B) – LOCAL GOVERNMENT
Local Government Notiﬁ cations
wxl 2357$50 – 2023 fkdjeïn¾ ui 11 jeks fikiqrdod – 2023'11'11
No. 2357/50 – SATURDAY, NOVEMBER 11, 2023
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
1A – PG6524 – 07 (11/2023)
PUTTALAM  URBAN  COUNCIL
 IN terms of the power conferred on the Urban Council by Section 46 of the Urban Council Ordinance No. 18 of 1987                    
(Cap. 255) mentioned in the sub - document containing the notice published in the Extraordinary Gazette No. 2341/07 of 
17.07.2023. We hereby inform the general public that the decision has been taken under the Management Committee No. 
Puuc/2023/10/960 held on 26.10.2023 as there has no any objection ﬁ led befor the speciﬁ ed dates regarding the ownership of 
the roads and streets in which it is stated that the ownership to be possessed by Puttalam Urban Council.  
 A list of names related to said roads and streets is attached with this Sub-document and it is hereby decalred that all the roads 
and streets mentioned therein should be considered as roads and streets owned by Puttalam Urban Council.
 
 L. B. G. P
REETHIKA,  
 Secretary,
 Puttalam  Urban Council Ofﬁ ce.
Puttalam Urban Council Ofﬁ ce,
30th of October 2023.
